title: Bonus Episode - More with Dirty John creator Christopher Goffard
description:
Jim Clemente and Lisa Zambetti welcome back Christopher Goffard, the Los Angeles Times writer and creator of the hit podcast Dirty John. They discuss the later episodes including the death of John and the aftermath.

New to Real Crime Profile? Never miss an episode by subscribing today at smarturl.it/realcrime.

Listen to the rest of Dirty John and subscribe here so you never miss an episode: https://smarturl.it/dirtyjohn

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
